translations: （鸭子似的）蹒跚行走，摇摆地走
摇摆的步伐，蹒跚的步态
【名】  （Waddle）（美、英）沃德尔（人名）；（Waddle）（美、英）沃德尔（人名）

sentences.sentence: I go for a waddle and do stretches and exercises every day.
sentences.translation: 我每天都会出去散散步，做做伸展运动。

sentences.sentence: To waddle a given distance, penguins use twice as much energy as other creatures of the same size use to walk equally far.
sentences.translation: 同样一段距离，企鹅以其摇摆的方式来行走，所消耗掉的体能是其他同体型动物的两倍之多。
